triplets: Jewelry worn around the wrist for decorative, cultural, or symbolic purposes
Fashion accessory, personal adornment, gifts, cultural or religious significance
Metal (gold, silver, stainless steel), leather, plastic, beads, fabric, or gemstones
Band or chain that encircles the wrist
Clasp or closure mechanism for securing it
Decorative elements such as charms, stones, or engravings
Varies depending on material, design, and manufacturer; common colors include gold, silver, black, and colorful beads
Fashion accessories, jewelry collections, personal adornment
Various manufacturers producing fashion, luxury, and handmade bracelets
Approximately 10–200 grams depending on material and design
Approximately 0.5–2 cm (thickness or width of the band)
Typically 2–20 years depending on material quality, usage, and care
